qas.question: Who holds the record for the most number 1 hits?
How many songs does Madonna have on the Hot Dance Club Songs Chart?
Who has the most number one songs in an active BiIlboard chart?
How many top 10 singles on the Hot 100 does Madonna have?
Who is the most successful solo artist in the history of American singles chart?

context: <a0_0>Madonna<a0_0/> holds the record for the most number-ones on all combined Billboard charts, including twelve number-one songs on the Billboard Hot 100 and eight number-one albums on the Billboard 200. With <a1_0>45<a1_0/> songs topping the Hot Dance Club Songs chart, <a2_0><a4_0>Madonna<a4_0/><a2_0/> became the artist with the most number-one songs on an active Billboard chart, pulling ahead of George Strait with 44 number-one songs on the Hot Country Songs chart. She has also scored <a3_0>38<a3_0/> top-ten singles on the Hot 100, more than any other artist in history. In 2008, Billboard magazine ranked her at number two, behind The Beatles, on the Billboard Hot 100 All-Time Top Artists, making her the most successful solo artist in the history of American singles chart.
